title: Textile, "Collection: An Homage to Jim Thompson", 1972
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: screen printed with discharge on dyed plain weave
inscribed: Thai silk Handwoven in Thailand with 100% pure silk (X-2) (printed in selvedge)
description: Length of printed silk with stylized waves and spindrift reminiscent of Japanese katagami stencil resist textiles. Hand printed with discharge dyes, giving a white pattern on a blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Collection: An Homage to Jim Thompson", 1972.
1972. Medium: silk
Technique: screen printed with discharge on dyed plain weave. Gift of Jack Lenor Larsen. 1973-54-1-a,b.
